title: Project SAM - Organ Mystique EXP 1.3 [KONTAKT]
description:
Torrent Info:
==============

This is not my own torrent! But I added some extra trackers.


Torrent Contents:
==================

Kontakt Library


Installation:
==============

Add the root folder of this torrent as a library to (cracked) Kontakt.


Product Info:
==============

ProjectSAM's Organ Mystique features three beautifully sampled, intimate and, at times, haunted sounding, Dutch church organs, offering an extended set of organ stops and registers.


INSTRUMENT LIST

Large Organ (NEW):
- Flute 4" & 8"
- Gamba 8"
- Gamba 8" & Bourdon 16"
- Gamba 8" & Bourdon 16" & Subbass
- Principal 8"
- Tutti A
- Tutti B

Box Organ (NEW!):
- 3"
- 4"
- 4" & 2"
- 4" & 3"
- 8" & 4"
- 8" & 4" & 2"
- 8" & 4" & 3"
- 4" & 3" & 2"

Original Organ Mystique:
- Hol-Flute 8'
- Octave 2'
- Rohr Flute 4'
- Tutti
- Tutti Vibrato
- Vibrato Hol-Flute 8'
- Viola di Gamba 8'
- Bass 8'
- Sub Bass 16'
- Bass Sub Bass
- Church Organ Effects set

The keyboard stops can be individually switched on/off/combined in real-time using the scripted Kontakt interface.

TECH SPECS:
- Kontakt 4 format. Compatible with Kontakt Player 4
- Dedicated interface with scripted features
- 4.3 GB library size (compressed NCW format)
- 2 stereo mic positions
